description:
The Bonneville hatchery P. lamprey holding tank will be used for the first evaluation of the collector.  The techonolgy wil be floated in the tank and the P. lamprey response to the technology in the tank will be assessed over 2-3 week period in early 2024 testing daily during the study period.

Evaluation 2 will be conducted in the Columbia river at a location where in lamprey tend to natually collect in seeking migration advancement, a location with safe accessibility and wherein premitting will have been obtained. Evaluation 2 will encompass at minimum a 2 month period of time in which the collector will be operated when it is manned at a minimum and data collected on all days of operation.

userSamples.name: BPA Sample for Study Design BKD Vertical Transmission Studies (2007-404-00) WSE 65787 (6717)

title: Columbia river Pacific Lamprey Collector Effectiveness
